description:
Join the voice actors of Itadori Yuuji and Toudou Aoi for a new year`s special summarizing the first season of Jujutsu Kaisen for new viewers with a special look at what`s to come.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Year`s Special: Jujutsu Kaisen - It`s Not Too Late! I Don`t Want to Regret Missing It! Special!
Shinshun Tokuban: Jujutsu Kaisen - Ima kara demo Maniau - Minogashite Goukai wa Shitakunai! Special!
新春特番 呪術廻戦 今からでも間に合う 見逃して後悔はしたくない! スペシャル!
